Detailed Description

ScriptEditorDialog class is the dialog to edit and run scripts with Tonatiuh.

ScriptEditorDialog allow to the user open, edit, run and save scripts to automate the ray tracing.

Definition at line 58 of file ScriptEditorDialog.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ScriptEditorDialog::ScriptEditorDialog ( QVector< TPhotonMapFactory * >  listTPhotonMapFactory,
QVector< RandomDeviateFactory * >  listRandomDeviateFactory,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a dialog to edit scripts and run them. The lists listTPhotonMapFactory and listRandomDeviateFactory are the photon map types and random generator types that can be defined in the scripts to run Tonatiuh. The dialog explorer shows the directories and scripts files from dirName path.
